channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Assignment A05 - EDA2
item.description: Dataset The dataset used for this assignment was taken from the larger dataset I will be using for my Master’s thesis. It includes information from time studies of an off-site modulate construction flooring process. The process produces modular office trailers, commonly referred to as either “units” or “trailers”. The initial data set is called “flooring”, and has been manipulated into subsets named “flooring_avg” and “worker_effect”. When analysing this data, there are many questions I would like to answer, including the following: How does the unit size effect overall timing for the flooring operation?

item.title: P01 Final Project
item.description: library(ggplot2) library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.1 -- ## v tibble 3.1.1 v dplyr 1.0.6 ## v tidyr 1.1.3 v stringr 1.4.0 ## v readr 1.4.0 v forcats 0.5.1 ## v purrr 0.3.4 ## -- Conflicts ------------------------------------------ tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(tidyr) library(dplyr) library(plyr) ## ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ## You have loaded plyr after dplyr - this is likely to cause problems.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
